game.title: The Throat of the World
game.objective: Retrieve the Elder Scroll from the top of the Throat of the World
game.description: The Greybeards have requested your presence at High Hrothgar. They believe you are the Dragonborn and can help them understand the return of the dragons.
game.reward: Dragonrend shout, increased magicka and stamina

tasks.objective: Talk to Arngeir at High Hrothgar
tasks.description: Travel to High Hrothgar and speak with Arngeir, the leader of the Greybeards.

tasks.objective: Climb the Throat of the World
tasks.description: Climb to the top of the highest mountain in Skyrim, the Throat of the World.
